title: Services
text: FTW provides a range of technology services to help Fruita residents and businesses with their tech needs:

title: Services

title: Thomas Wells
text:
Hi, I’m Thomas!
I’m an independent consultant based in Fruita. My main gig (Dynamodal) is working with utilities and energy companies across the nation on energy effficiency and data analysis projects. I enjoy that work, but I also want do something to help my local community, so I started Fruita Tech Wizard to provide friendly, personalized tech support for local residents and businesses.
I’ve always been the go-to tech person for my family, friends and coworkers, and I love helping people solve their tech problems. Whether it’s fixing a slow computer, sorting out errors after the latest Windows upgarde, setting up a new phone, or optimizing a WiFi network, I’m here to help.
I studied Physics and Electrical Engineering at the Colorado School of Mines. After a few years in the Alaskan oil fields, I moved back to Colorado and started working as a data science consultant.
When I’m not working, I enjoy biking, running, and exploring the trails and rivers around Fruita.

Why FTW ?
I think it’s a fun nod to Fruita’s “memorable” (infamous?) WTF (Welcome to Fruita) stickers. And of course, FTW is internet slang for “For The Win”, which is exactly what I want to help you do with your technology!

title: FTW
text:
Fruita Tech Wizard
Fruita’s local tech support


Need help with your computer, phone, or home technology? Fruita Tech Wizard, #FTW, is here to help!
Based in Fruita, we provide friendly, personalized tech support for local residents and businesses.
Yes, we make house calls!

What We Do

Computer troubleshooting and repairs
Phone and tablet support
Home WiFi setup and optimization
Smart home device installation
Small business IT services
AI and ChatGPT training
General tech advice and guidance
Help you keep old tech working longer

Check out the services page for more details.






TipAI Training and Consulting



There’s a lot of hype around AI tools like ChatGPT, and the landscape is changing rapidly. We can help you navigate this new world while protecting your privacy and security.
Whether you’re curious about AI for personal use or want to integrate it into your business, we offer friendly, hands-on training and advice tailored to your needs.




Why Choose FTW?

Local, trusted service
Clear communication
Fair pricing
Free quotes
Decades of experience



Contact
 Call or Text: (720) 213-6374  Email: help@fruitatechwizard.com
Free quotes - just call, text, or email!
